text: Arau yadi nirdista samayara babe ami sihamtara paraa sasti sthagita raakho tente sihamte arasye ka’ba, ‘kihe iyaka nibarana karaiche’? Saradhana! Yidina sihamtara ocarata e'ito ahiba se'i dina e'ito sihamtara paraa nibrtta karaa naha’ba arau yi bisaye sihamte thatraa-bidraupa karae seya sihamtaka paraibestana karaiba
